testcase.name: Checkout a Product
testcase.system-out: Given I am in the homepage from login with "standard_user" and "secret_sauce".passed When I click the add to cart button Sauce Labs Bike Light,Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt.passed And I click the cart button.................................................passed And I click the checkout button.............................................passed And I fill in the checkout information with "Ayu", "Puspita", and "12345"...passed And I click the continue button.............................................passed And I verify the products before finishing the purchase Sauce Labs Bike Light,Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt.passed And I click the finish button...............................................passed Then I should see the thank you message.....................................passed

testcase.name: Filter a Product
testcase.failure:
